page.title: 06MAJOR INDUSTRIES
page.content:
There are two major industries in this area. These are an agricultural feed mill and a gravel pit.
The gravel from the pit is dug out and pushed into a lake of clean water and then it is sucked out and put into storage chambers. The washed gravel is then sold mainly as a building material.
The feed mill uses wheat,barley,fish meal and minerals which are ground and mixed together to make animal food. The food is made into pellets of various sizes to suit different animals. The feed mill has invented a special mixture itself.The feed which is produced is sold to many farmers in the district and further afield.
